subheader: Prototype simulation of clone and character progression in EVE Frontier.
body: Gather enough resources to build your first Womb.
The Womb is the organ that grows new clones.
Once the Womb is built, gather enough resources to grow clones.
Different materials and rare Shilajit samples are required for each type.
Each clone consumes a portion of the SELF.
Growing new clones weakens you temporarily but enables field operations.
Undertake expeditions — Mining, Combat, or Exploration.
Different clones are suited for different missions, earning more XP when well-matched.
Every venture strengthens the clone but risks annihilation and loss.
If a clone dies, no progress is saved to the SELF.
Returning clones can be uploaded, preserving a part of their accumulated memory.
Kinetic, Cognitive, and Constructive disciplines evolve with continued use. The more experienced the uploaded clones, the stronger the SELF becomes.
